headline: Why Semiconductor Equipment Stocks ASML Holdings, KLA, and Lam Research Plunged Today
summary: Semiconductor stocks are long-term growers, but they also have cyclical qualities as well.  In addition, tariffs that increase trade tensions with China tend to especially complicate things for semiconductor stocks.  This is because China is a big purchaser of chips, and its government is also investing heavily in domestic chipmaking alternatives, including homegrown semiconductor equipment stocks.
